title: Sr. Software Dev. Engineer/MLE, AGI Customization
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Lead development of LLM training techniques and optimizations.  
• Collaborate with Applied Scientists on multimodal AI solutions.  
• Investigate design approaches and evaluate technical feasibility.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 5+ years of software development experience.  
• 5+ years of programming in at least one language.  
• Experience mentoring or leading engineering teams.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning and AI frameworks.  
• Agile/Scrum methodologies.  
• Large-scale computing resources.

title: Language Engineer, Artificial General Intelligence - Data Services
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design complex data collections with human participants.  
• Conduct data creation using synthetic and model-based methods.  
• Analyze large datasets and extract insights.  
• Build tools for data analysis or creation using scripting languages.  
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to evaluate AI model performance.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• Master's degree in Computational Linguistics or related field.  
• 2+ years experience in computational linguistics or AI data creation.  
• Proficient in scripting languages, especially Python.  
• Experience with multimodal data in multiple languages.  
• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Python for scripting and data analysis.  
• Familiarity with APIs and version control.  
• Experience with SQL, R, or Matlab for data analysis.  
• Knowledge of machine learning concepts.  
• Tools for data annotation and markup systems.

• Experience with SQL, R, or Matlab for data analysis.

• Tools for data annotation and markup systems.

title: Software Development Engineer , AGI Customization
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Lead development of novel LLM training techniques and optimizations.  
• Collaborate with Applied Scientists on multimodal AI solutions.  
• Build customization capabilities like fine-tuning and prompt optimization.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 3+ years of professional software development experience.  
• 2+ years in design or architecture of systems.  
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine learning and AI frameworks.  
• Software programming languages (e.g., Python, Java).  
• Large-scale computing resources and data sources.

title: Business Intelligence Engineer, ProdOps OAT, Project Kuiper
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Implement and maintain analytics solutions for satellite technology.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams for data-driven decision making.
- Design self-service reporting solutions that scale organization-wide.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 3+ years of data analysis experience with SQL and large datasets.
- Proficiency in data visualization tools like Tableau or Grafana.
- Experience with data modeling, warehousing, and ETL pipelines.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- SQL databases (Redshift, Oracle, NoSQL).
- Data visualization software (Tableau, Quick Suite).
- AWS solutions (EC2, S3, Redshift).

title: Member of Technical Staff Intern (2026), Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Contribute to AI agent development in a research engineering role  
• Design and enhance tools for cutting-edge research  
• Collaborate with researchers on new techniques and tools  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 18 years of age or older  
• Experience in at least one modern programming language  
• Enrolled in a relevant Bachelor's degree program  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Large language models (LLMs)  
• Reinforcement learning (RL)  
• Object-oriented programming (Java, C++, C#)
